General.preQuizText: Each of the following examples illustrates a particular area for improvement in student feedback journals. For each quote, identify the weakness that best describes the section of text on display.

Questions.questionText: I need to make sure I have time to make the assignment properly and not rush it.

answers.answerText:
Action plan is not specific
enough

Uses point-form
style

Rejects the
instructor’s feedback

Provides only a
factual description of feedback with little interpretation.

Questions.questionText: For my next assignment I will strive for greater organization by rereading my work and fixing my flaws. And I will adopt a more formal tone.

answers.answerText:
Action plan is not specific
enough

Uses point-form
style

Rejects the
instructor’s feedback

Provides only a
factual description of feedback with little interpretation.

Questions.questionText:
• I consistently use the wrong date/running head format.
  • Rarely (if ever) do I actually follow the templates and/or the actual purpose of the assignment.
  • I tend to use less than ideal sources.
  • I tend to have a very noticeable bias.
  • Main ideas seem to be disconnected and/or have very weak supporting points
  • I have strong diction and a powerful prose in my writing (both good and bad, depending on the task).
  • My grammar is generally good, and continues to get better.

answers.answerText:
Action plan is not specific
enough

Uses point-form
style

Rejects the
instructor’s feedback

Provides only a
factual description of feedback with little interpretation.

Questions.questionText: My bias and voice are one in the same with my writing, asking me to write without those two would be like asking a pianist to play treble with his left. Sure, technically he could do it, but goodness knows it wouldn’t be nearly as pleasing to listen to.

answers.answerText: Action plan is not specific enough
Uses point-form style
Rejects the instructor’s feedback
Provides only a factual description of feedback with little interpretation.

Questions.questionText: The professor has pointed out my use of plural verb with a singular noun. Also my use of comma splice could have been replaced by two complete sentences. My paragraph structure needs to have unity when I write them the topic should not change suddenly half way through the paragraph.

answers.answerText: Action plan is not specific enough
Uses point-form style
Rejects the instructor’s feedback
Provides only a factual description of feedback with little interpretation.
